H0.text: Balance is the tool that, when properly used, best helps a student classify a basket of apples into groups based on mass.

H1.text: A thermometer, when properly used, is the tool that would best help a student classify a basket of apples into groups based on mass.

H2.text: Meter stick is the tool that, when properly used, would best help a student classify a basket of apples into groups based on mass.

H3.text: A graduated cylinder is the tool that, when properly used, would best help a student classify a basket of apples into groups based on mass.

A4.text: Assuming the gravitational field is equivalent on both sides of the balance, a balance measures relative weight, giving the relative gravitation mass of each object.
